messages.title: Building A Brighter Future
messages.content: I think Lincolnshire has lost out over many years and I believe we deserve better for our community.

messages.title: Lib Dems lead the fight to save our NHS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are the only party campaigning to give our NHS the support it really needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Lib Dem government would stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest £35 billion to protect our NHS and Social Care systems
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest an extra £35 billion in the health service and social care is a Lib Dem priority.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion investment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle the climate emergency and invest in renewables
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
